thread.title: Revenge will be a tall order for UConn vs. BYU
thread.title_full: Revenge will be a tall order for UConn vs. BYU

author: ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN
title: Revenge will be a tall order for UConn vs. BYU
text:
11:49 PM EDT 
Revenge will be a tall order for UConn vs. BYU BY ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN Browse for Republican American Reprints UConn football coach Bob Diaco is not necessarily known for his economy of words. There are times, though, when he gets straight to the point."We're going to play a BYU team that beat the snot out of us a year ago," Diaco said Monday.
